item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installation We won’t cover further details how to properly setup Prometheus itself, we will only cover some basic setup based on docker-compose. But if you want to run this service discovery without docker-compose you should be able to adopt that to your needs. item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes So far we got the deployment via Kustomize to get this service discovery working on Kubernetes. We are already working on a Helm chart to offer more options, dependening on your preferences. Kustomize We won’t cover the installation of Kustomize or encryption tooling like KSOPS within this guide, to get it installed and working please consult the documentation of these projects. After the installation of Kustomize you just need to prepare a kustomization.

item.title: Building
item.description: As this project is built with Go you need to install Go first. The installation of Go is out of the scope of this document, please follow the official documentation. After the installation of Go you need to get the sources: git clone https://github.com/promhippie/prometheus-vcd-sd.git cd prometheus-vcd-sd/ All required tool besides Go itself are bundled by Go modules, all you need is part of the Makfile: make generate build Finally you should have the binary within the bin/ folder now, give it a try with .
